statements: UPSERT INTO WasteManagement (id, waste_type, disposal_method, disposal_location) VALUES (1, 'Plastic', 'Recycling', 'Recycling Center')

INSERT INTO waste_collection (id, location, collection_date) VALUES (1, 'Location A', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET location = 'Location A', collection_date = '2022-01-01';
INSERT INTO waste_disposal (id, location, disposal_date) VALUES (1, 'Location B', '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET location = 'Location B', disposal_date = '2022-01-01';

UPSERT INTO WasteCollection (collection_id, collection_date, location_id, collected_weight) VALUES (1, '2022-09-01', 101, 500) ON CONFLICT (collection_id) DO UPDATE SET collection_date = '2022-09-01', location_id = 101, collected_weight = 500;
UPSERT INTO WasteType (type_id, type_name) VALUES (1, 'Plastic') ON CONFLICT (type_id) DO UPDATE SET type_name = 'Plastic';

UPSERT INTO WasteDisposal (disposal_id, disposal_date, disposal_location, disposal_method) VALUES (1, '2022-09-01', 201, 'Recycling') ON CONFLICT (disposal_id) DO UPDATE SET disposal_date = '2022-09-01', disposal_location = 201, disposal_method = 'Recycling';

UPSERT INTO waste_disposal (disposal_id, disposal_location, disposal_date, disposed_weight) VALUES (1, 'Disposal Site X', '2022-10-20', 80.25)

INSERT INTO waste_collection_locations (location_id, location_name, location_address, collection_day) VALUES (1, 'Location A', 'Address A', 'Monday') ON CONFLICT (location_id) DO UPDATE SET location_name = 'Location A', location_address = 'Address A', collection_day = 'Monday';

INSERT INTO waste_collection_locations (location_id, location_name, location_address, collection_day) VALUES (2, 'Location B', 'Address B', 'Wednesday') ON CONFLICT (location_id) DO UPDATE SET location_name = 'Location B', location_address = 'Address B', collection_day = 'Wednesday';
